sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推動全世界的改裝奔馳車。

sentences.english: Page insisted that photos be uploaded with one click.
sentences.chinese: 但佩奇堅持認爲，照片應該一鍵上傳。

sentences.english: Both Gundotra and Page say the latter goal is the more important one.
sentences.chinese: 剛鐸與佩奇都表示，後一個目標更爲重要。

sentences.english: Done properly, this exercise is good for inner and outer pecs .
sentences.chinese: 做得好，這項工作是有利的內部和外部佩奇。

sentences.english: Farmer tells Paige that's just a minimum.
sentences.chinese: 法默告訴佩奇這是最低要求。

sentences.english: In Page's web, everything starts with a search.
sentences.chinese: 在佩奇的世界裏，一切均從搜索開始。

sentences.english: In his debut earnings call with investors, Page made nary a mention of social.
sentences.chinese: 佩奇與投資者的首度收入會議對社交網絡隻字未提。

sentences.english: "I'm very, very optimistic about our future, " Page said in brief comments.
sentences.chinese: “我對我們的未來非常非常樂觀”佩奇這樣簡評說。

sentences.english: Mr Page and Mr Brin rank joint 26th.
sentences.chinese: 佩奇和布林共同排在第26位。

sentences.english: Bechtolsheim believed that Brin and Page could succeed.
sentences.chinese: 貝奇托爾謝姆認爲布林和佩奇能夠取得成功。

sentences.english: Brin and Page declined to eat the Subway sandwiches Baidu served for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 布林和佩奇拒絕食用百度提供的三明治午餐。

sentences.english: Narrator: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles.
sentences.chinese: 佩奇和喬治喜歡在泥坑裏跳。

sentences.english: But it is Capecchi's story that is particularly striking.
sentences.chinese: 然而，卡佩奇的故事最具傳奇色彩。

sentences.english: She teaches writing at College of DuPage and Benedictine University.
sentences.chinese: 佛提爾目前在杜佩奇學院及本篤會大學教寫作。

sentences.english: His wife and daughter, Paige, have supported Childers in his ministry.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子和女兒，佩奇，都在他的支持奇爾德斯部。

sentences.english: When I first went to university, I lodged at Mrs Page's.
sentences.chinese: 我初上大學時，寄宿在佩奇太太家。

definition: Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
Harper (name)/see also 斯蒂芬·哈珀[Si1 di4 fen1 · Ha1 po4]
